messages.message:
Hey team, customer has reported that they are getting this error message in AI Hub Build (MT). I can replicate in this (https://aihub.instabase.com/build/0195b2f3-5de9-79d0-8524-7ec275431563) project.

I am getting this bug for all fields in this document, but not seeing the error message with another doc.

The error is triggered by turning on FR. Either standard or advanced models return the same error.

Can we investigate ASAP?

<!subteam^S05BKH20B4K>
I see issue with Filesystem write at platform status.
Creating an incident

*Aegis has created the incident*
Incident Channel: <#C08JVK1TVKK>
Incident: 674 (https://instabase.app.opsgenie.com/incident/detail/3851689d-24b4-4cb7-b74d-1eb256cd5eb1)

Created by @sitaram
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08JVK1TVKK/p1742464777469359

Please file bug ticket for this @Hamish as we need to make sure we fail more gracefully.

Also cc: @Josh Rad as this is a use case for status page

I'm hearing that we have fixed the bug but that the fix won't be deployed until Monday US time (Tuesday Singapore). Is that right @Ram Prasanna?

I need to respond to the customer saying that this bug won't be fixed until then so want to confirm (workaround will be turning off FR which may not be feasible for their project)

hey @Hamish 25.10 is delayed to this issue (<#C08J1G9HNKV|>) and the plan was to defer the deployment until coming Monday. Reading the above, are you requesting an earlier deployment? cc @Ashish @sudeep @Yash Aggarwal
If we can resolve this bug before then I would like that yes. This is not an uncommon scenario so I expect it to affect more than just UOB.
The rate at which we fix bugs will also be a factor in how they view Instabase given we are closing out a customer build POV
cc @Jasper

This was discussed in an EPD leads conversation if there are any urgent fixes / features tracked for 25.10 -- and nothing was suggested. We can push latest patch release for 25.10 on Friday morning if needed.

@Hamish is this bug same as what Yash confirmed fixed here
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08JVK1TVKK/p1742470042222679
According to the incident channel yes
okay in that case we have a certified release for _edit: 25.10_ available that we can push
When will that happen? I can either verify the fix or advise the customer of when this will be active

> okay in that case we have a certified release for 25.08 available that we can push
@sudeep I dont think the fix was backported to 25.08. @Nikolaos Kofinas could you confirm please?
Yeah we havent backported it yet. @sudeep creating a backport
apologies - edited my message above - referring to 25.10 release that we can push, not 25.08
oh ok. nvm then :sweat_smile:
:+1: thanks!
@sudeep so are we deploying 25.10 earlier than monday IST because of this bug fix?
exactly
working with Ashish on sending comms out
